user_instruction: 'Send an update to the Academic Alliance (academicalliance@university.edu) about our next study session. You can check out my Gmail and Jane'"'"'s Genius Planner for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["academicalliance@university.edu"],"subject":"Upcoming Study Session – Agenda & Preparation","body":"Hello Academic Alliance team,

Here’s a brief update on our upcoming study session:

Date & Time: Thursday morning, starting at 10:00 AM (please arrive a few minutes early).
Location: our usual library study room.

Tentative Agenda
1. Welcome and quick recap of key concepts from our last meeting.
2. Discussion of new material from Chapters 4 & 5, with an emphasis on statistical methods.
3. Short break.
4. Group problem-solving focused on the next assignment and mid-term preparation.
5. Wrap-up and action items for the following week.

Please bring your notes, textbooks, laptops, and any questions you’d like to tackle together.

Looking forward to another productive session with everyone!

Best regards,
Your Study Session Coordinator"}

formatted_items.content: The session update has been sent to academicalliance@university.edu.
